All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdjacentPattern
A pattern describing one or more groups of adjacent tiles of the same type
ArrestGameException
This exception is used when there is an error in the setting files or in the state of the game that doesn't allow to continue the playing.
BoardListener
Listener of the LivingRoomBoard
BoardUpdate
Msg that identifies a change in the LivingRoomBoard
BookShelf
Class that represents the bookshelf of a player
BookShelfUpdate
Msg that identifies a change in a BookShelf
CardsPointsManager
A PointsManagers which also manages a deck of cards
Chat
Class that represents the chat
ChatController
Controller used to manage the game chat
ChatListener
Listener of the Chat
ChatMessage
Msg that identifies a new message sent/received The Chat message doesn't contain receiver because it's used buy the communication layer, there is no interest in saying: "This is message is for you, I send it only to you, you are the receiver"
CLI
CLI class is the class that handles the CLI It extends View It contains the inputThread and the inputScanner It contains the methods to start, stop, render, show error, show chat, show help, show goals and show chat notification
CliColor
This class contains all the ANSI escape codes for colors and styles.
Client
Class that represents the client
Client.DisconnectTask
 
Client.Protocols
 
Client.Views
 
ClientCommunication
this class should be implemented from the client class that sends messages to the server, being it through RMI or TCP or other, this class can be used from the client (being it a controller, an observer or directly the view) to send messages to the server
ClientCommunicationException
Class that represents an exception thrown in the ClientCommunication
ClientConnection
this interface is a simple interface for opening or closing a generic type of connection the client MUST use only one instance of this class
ClientConnectionException
Class that represents an exception thrown in the ClientCommunication
ClientController
Class that represents the controller of the client
ClientGoal
Class that represents a goal on the client side, used for parsing from json
ClientGoalDetail
Detail of the goal
ClientGoalParser
Class that parses the goals from a json internal to the jar
ClientNotificationListener
this class should be implemented from the client class that handles the notification, being it a controller or a directly the view, the client MUST use only one instance of this class
ClientStates
Enum that represents the possible states of the client
CLIRenderer
CLI based renderer
Command
Command sent by the client to the server
CommonCards
Msg that identifies a change in the CommonCards
CommonCardsPointsManager
A PointsManager that handles all the common cards, which are goals that anyone can fulfill only once, this PointsManager does not take into account neither the points nor the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern
CommonGoalCardsListener
Listener of the common goals cards and their tokens
CommonGoalsPointsManager
A PointsManager that handles all the common goals, which are goals that anyone can fulfill, this PointsManager takes into account both the points and the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern
ControllerProvider
Container of controllers used to play the game
DateTimeTypeAdapter
 
Deck
Class representing a deck of cards
Disconnect
Command to disconnect
Disconnection
Msg that identifies a disconnection
EmptyLobbyException
Exception used when the lobby is not full
EndState
Class that represents the end state of a turn
ErrorMessage
Msg that identifies a general error message from the server
FirstJoinResponse
Response of a first join command
FirstPlayerAbsentException
Exception used when the lobby has no first player
FullGameException
Exception used when game is full
Game
Class representing the game itself.
GameCommand
Command that requires client id to be performed
GameListener
Listener of game changes as turn, picked tiles, last disconnection of a player, winner, and starting of the game
GameLoadException
Exception used when there is a problem with the loading of the game
GameNameException
Exception used when game with a specific name is not available
GameSaved
Msg that identifies the save of the current game
GameSetUp
GameSetUP is the object sent to the player at the beginning of a starting game.
GameTypeAdapter
 
GetLoadedPlayers
Command to get the players of a loaded game
GetSavedGames
Command to get the saves
GoalManager
Class used to load the goals, handle all the managers and calculate total points
GUI
GUI based view
GUIApplication
GUIApplication that renders all the GUI
GUIChat
Generates the GUI for the chat.
GUICreateGame
Generates the GUI for creating a game.
GUICreateLobby
Represents the GUI state for creating a lobby.
GUIEndGame
Generates the GUI for the end game.
GUIInGame
Generates the GUI for the in game.
GUILoadGame
Generates the GUI for the load game.
GUILoadNames
Generates the GUI for the selection of the name.
GUILobby
Generates the GUI for when players are in lobby.
GUILogin
Generates the GUI for the login state.
GUIState
Generic GUI state representing a state or a part of the GUI.
Hello
Message sent at the first connection of the client ot notify them of the current lobby situation
HelloCommand
Command performed to see the lobby status
IllegalLobbyException
Action could not be performed in the lobby for absence of privileges
InputCLI
InputCLI class is the class that handles the input from the user
InvalidPatternParameterException
Class that represents an exception thrown while creating a pattern using invalid parameters
Join
Command to join the lobby not as a first player
JoinLoadedAsFirst
Command to join loaded game as first player
JoinNewAsFirst
Command to join a new game as first player
JoinResponse
response from a join
LivingRoomBoard
Class that represents the board of the game
LoadedGamePlayers
Response of a GetLoadedPlayers
LoadGame
Command to load a saved game
LoadGameResponse
Response message of a LoadGame command
Lobby
This class represents the lobby of the game.
Logger
logger that logs messages in a text file
Message
Class that represents a message
Msg
General message from the server
MyShelfie
Main class to launch the application
MyShelfie.LaunchMode
 
NicknameException
Exception used when a nickname is not available
NicknameTakenException
Exception used when a nickname was already taken
ObjectCleaner
Class used in testing to ensure that an object is garbage collected, only used in testing
OptionalSerializer
Serializer for Optional class
OptionalTypeAdapter<E>
TypeAdapter for Optional class
Pattern
A class that generalizes the assignment of points based on a bookshelf state
PatternTypeAdapter
TypeAdapter for Pattern class
PersonalCardsPointsManager
A PointsManager that handles all the personal cards, which are goals that a player can fulfill multiple times, note that points are not summed, but the latest fulfillment will be taken into account, this PointsManager takes into account the points but not the edited bookshelf state returned from the pattern
PersonalPattern
A pattern describing a personal card's objective
PickTilesCommand
Command to pick tiles
PickTilesState
State where the player picks tiles from the board
Ping
Ping message
PlayController
Controlled used to play the game independently of the model and manage saves
Player
Class that represents a player
PlayerListener
Listener of the player: points, playing state, bookshelf
PlayerNotFoundException
Exception used when it's asked something abut a player that doesn't exists
PlayerPoints
Msg that identifies a change in the points of a player
PointsManager
Represents a PointsManager that assigns points based on the state of the player and its bookshelf PointsManagers can have additional parameters and the assigned points can depend on other things such as Patterns
Pong
Pong command, used in response to a Ping message
PostProcessable
Interface that represents an object that needs to be post processed after deserialization
PostProcessingEnabler
TypeAdapterFactory for PostProcessable class
PostProcessingEnabler.PostProcessingEnablerTypeAdapter<T>
 
PushNotificationController
Class to redirect notifications from the model to the servers registered
PutTilesCommand
Command to perform a put tiles action
PutTilesState
State where the player puts tiles in their bookshelf
Reconnect
Command to reconnect to the game
Reconnected
Msg that identifies a change in the reconnection of a player
ResponseServer
Class that implements methods to answer a client request and implements the ServerCommunication notifications interface
RMIClient
The RMIClient interface defines the remote methods that can be called by the server to notify the client of various events.
RMIClientCommunication
RMI based implementation of ClientCommunication it uses a RMIClientConnection to call methods on the server note that some methods expect a return value, the ClientCommunication class is responsible for dedicating threads that wait for that return value and call the appropriate functions on RMIClientConnection
RMIClientConnection
Creates the RMI client connection endpoint (implementing ClientConnection).
RMIRespondServer
This class is used to implement the ResponseServer necessary to the RMIServerApp
RMIServer
The RMIServer interface defines the remote methods that can be called by the client in the server.
RMIServerApp
The RMIServerApp class is the RMI server that handles the communication with the client.
SavedGames
Message response of a GetSavedGames command
SaveException
Exception used when there is a problem while game is saving
SaveGame
Command to save the game
SendMessage
Command to send a message to a player
ServerApp
Main class to launch the server
ServerCommunication
Interface of the notification methods of the servers
SpecificPattern
A specific pattern with multiple flags and variables allowing for customization
StandardListenable
Interface used from classes that can be listened to, from standard listeners in "listeners" package
StandardListener
Standard listener for the model
State
Abstract class that represents a state of the turn
TCPClientCommunication
TCP based implementation of ClientCommunication uses a TCPClientConnection to send messages to the server
TCPClientConnection
Handles the TCP connection: opens it, closes it, handles notifications, receives and sends messages from and to the server
TCPServer
This class is a ResponseServer used for TCP and implements the ServerCommunication notifications interface
Tile
Class that represents a tile
TileRule
Enum that represents the rules of the tiles
TilesPicked
Msg that identifies a change in the picked tiles
TileType
Enum that represents the type of the tiles
Turn
Class that represents a turn
TurnNotify
Msg that identifies turn change
UpdateRule
the frequency to which the PointsManager MUST be updated
View
Abstract class that represents a view
WaitLobbyException
Exception used when the lobby is not ready.
Winner
Winner message
